description: This file contains Streamlit UI components for user interaction, including functions to get username, reload session, check password, and retrieve OpenAI API key, primarily used in a Streamlit web app.

methods.name: get_username_sidebar
methods.description: Sidebar component to get username from user input or session state.

methods.name: reload_button_sidebar
methods.description: Displays a reload button in the sidebar that clears session state and reruns the app.

methods.name: check_password
methods.description: Checks if the user-provided password matches the environment variable, managing session state accordingly.

methods.name: get_openai_key_sidebar
methods.description: Retrieves the OpenAI API key from environment or user input, storing it in session state and environment variables.
